bibl.title: Alexandrian Science: The Case of Eratosthenes.
bibl.note: An appraisal of Eratosthenes of Cyrene as a scientist and scholar in his Alexandrian and Hellenistic environment. - Pp. 70-73: Texts.
bibl.seg: BLOMQVIST Jerker, Alexandrian Science: The Case of Eratosthenes.
Per BILDE et alii (Edd.), Ethnicity in Hellenistic Egypt = Studies in Hellenistic Civilization. III (Aarhus, 1992) pp. 53-73.
An appraisal of Eratosthenes of Cyrene as a scientist and scholar in his Alexandrian and Hellenistic environment. - Pp. 70-73: Texts.
